verses.verse: I exhort <S%G3870><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> that, first <S%G4412><s%> of all, <S%G3956><s%> supplications, <S%G1162><s%> prayers, <S%G4335><s%> intercessions, <S%G1783><s%> and giving of thanks, <S%G2169><s%> be made <S%G4160><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> men; <S%G444><s%>

For kings, <S%G935><s%> and for all <S%G3956><s%> that are in authority; <S%G5247><s%> that we may lead <S%G1236><s%> a quiet <S%G2263><s%> and peaceable <S%G2272><s%> life <S%G979><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> godliness <S%G2150><s%> and honesty. <S%G4587><s%>
For this <S%G5124><s%> is good <S%G2570><s%> and acceptable <S%G587><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> our Savior; <S%G4990><s%>
Who <S%G3739><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> have all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G444><s%> to be saved, <S%G4982><s%> and to come <S%G2064><s%> to the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of the truth. <S%G225><s%>

For there is one <S%G1520><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and one <S%G1520><s%> mediator <S%G3316><s%> between God <S%G2316><s%> and men, <S%G444><s%> the man <S%G444><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus; <S%G2424><s%>
Who <S%G3588><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> a ransom <S%G487><s%> for all, <S%G3956><s%> to be testified <S%G3142><s%> in due <S%G2398><s%> time. <S%G2540><s%>

Whereunto <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3739><s%> I am ordained <S%G5087><s%> a preacher, <S%G2783><s%> and an apostle, <S%G652><s%> (I speak <S%G3004><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> in Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and lie <S%G5574><s%> not;) a teacher <S%G1320><s%> of the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> in faith <S%G4102><s%> and verity. <S%G225><s%>

I will <S%G1014><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> that men <S%G435><s%> pray <S%G4336><s%> every <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3956><s%> where, <S%G1722><s%> lifting <S%G1869><s%> up holy <S%G3741><s%> hands, <S%G5495><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> wrath <S%G3709><s%> and doubting. <S%G1261><s%>

In like <S%G5615><s%> manner also, <S%G2532><s%> that women <S%G1135><s%> adorn <S%G2885><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> in modest <S%G2887><s%> apparel, <S%G2689><s%> with modesty <S%G127><s%> and sobriety; <S%G4997><s%> not with braided <S%G4117><s%> hair, <S%G4117><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> gold, <S%G5557><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> pearls, <S%G3135><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> costly <S%G4185><s%> array; <S%G2441><s%>
But (which <S%G3739><s%> becomes <S%G516><s%> women <S%G1135><s%> professing <S%G1861><s%> godliness) <S%G2317><s%> with good <S%G18><s%> works. <S%G2041><s%>
Let the woman <S%G1135><s%> learn <S%G3129><s%> in silence <S%G2271><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> subjection. <S%G5292><s%>

But I suffer <S%G2010><s%> not a woman <S%G1135><s%> to teach, <S%G1321><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> to usurp <S%G831><s%> authority <S%G831><s%> over the man, <S%G435><s%> but to be in silence. <S%G2271><s%>
For Adam <S%G76><s%> was first <S%G4413><s%> formed, <S%G4111><s%> then <S%G1534><s%> Eve. <S%G2096><s%>
And Adam <S%G76><s%> was not deceived, <S%G538><s%> but the woman <S%G1135><s%> being deceived <S%G538><s%> was in the transgression. <S%G3847><s%>

Notwithstanding she shall be saved <S%G4982><s%> in childbearing, <S%G5042><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> they continue <S%G3306><s%> in faith <S%G4102><s%> and charity <S%G26><s%> and holiness <S%G38><s%> with sobriety. <S%G4997><s%>
